title: Meet the space billionaire who is interested in something other than rockets
summary: Vast's acquisition of Launcher shows that Jed McCaleb is serious about this space thing.

title: China to expand its space station, international astronaut selection underway
summary: China is planning to expand its Tiangong space station with a multi-functional module to enhance its capabilities.

title: Japan selects first new astronauts in 14 years to support Artemis program
summary: Japan’s space agency JAXA said Feb. 28 it had selected two astronaut candidates as part of efforts to support the NASA-led Artemis lunar exploration program.

title: SpaceX begins launching second-generation Starlink satellites with four times the network capacity
summary: Elon Musk’s SpaceX has launched the first batch of its next-generation Starlink internet satellites as the company upgrades and further builds out its orbiting network.

title: SpaceX launches first upgraded Starlink satellites
summary: SpaceX launched the first set of upgraded Starlink satellites for its second-generation constellation Feb. 27, featuring increased capacity and new technologies.
